subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Chris Davis and Nelson Cruz each blasted a two-run home run and Jonathan Schoop added a three-run shot in the eighth to bury the Yankees, and stretch Baltimore’s lead in the A.L. East to seven games.
snippet: Chris Davis and Nelson Cruz each blasted a two-run home run and Jonathan Schoop added a three-run shot in the eighth to bury the Yankees, and stretch Baltimore’s lead in the A.L. East to seven games.
